com.diffplug.common.base

Class Errors.Handling

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.base.Errors
      • com.diffplug.common.base.Errors.Handling
  • Enclosing class:
    Errors

    public static class Errors.Handling
extends Errors
    An Errors which is free to rethrow the exception, but it might not. If we want to wrap a method with a return value, since the handler might not throw an exception, we need a default value to return.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.diffplug.common.base.Errors
